name: astro-i18n-cms-starter
description: A starter for Astro with i18n support

scripts.structure:
npx --yes tree-extended -max=5 -max-show-not-empty -gitignore > docs/structure.md && echo '```' >> docs/structure.md && cat docs/structure.md | sed -i '' -e '1i\
```plaintext' docs/structure.md && echo '# Project Structure
' | cat - docs/structure.md > temp && mv temp docs/structure.md
